text: Welcome to the Stargate Text Adventure!
The year is 2025, and the Stargate program is Earth's first line of defense.
Your mission is to infiltrate and destroy a Goa'uld Ha'tak.
But first, you must eliminate the Jaffa base on Mars.

outro: You jump into a Goauld Deathglider and escape the ship just when it is about to explode.
You start the Hyperspace engines and fly back to Earth...
Congratulations! You have defeated the System Lord Ra and saved Earth. Humanity owes you a great debt.
